content.raw: I'm afraid that we could be hidden problems somehow using the patch, specially for all those automatic not attended tests or those that do not display to screen the standard output. I would go more for let the exception to go to up levels, and if needed, catch the exception and process it there.
content.html: I'm afraid that we could be hidden problems somehow using the patch, specially for all those automatic not attended tests or those that do not display to screen the standard output.
